titleproper.value: Guide to the Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging Publications <num>RG.35.5</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-05-09T13:36:39</date>

unittitle.value: Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging Publications

extent.value: in 3 manuscript boxes and 1 oversize flat box

abstract.value: The Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts is a four-year BFA program focused on the making and understanding of images through an arts curriculum grounded in liberal arts education. Students and faculty in the department work in varied modes of analog and digital photo-based image making and multimedia. This collection consists of publications from the Department of Photography and Imaging from the late 1980s through the 2010s, and includes catalogs, programs from exhibitions, and copies of <emph render="italic">ISO</emph> magazine.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging Publications; RG 35.5; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Transferred by Tisch School of the Arts Department of Photography and Imaging in September 2017; the accession number associated with this transfer is 2019.037.

The Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts is a four-year BFA program focused on the making and understanding of images through an arts curriculum grounded in liberal arts education. Students and faculty in the department work in varied modes of analog and digital photo-based image making and multimedia.

This collection consists of publications from Department of Photography and Imaging at the NYU Tisch School of the Arts from the late 1980s through the 2010s, and includes catalogs, programs from exhibitions, and copies of <emph render="italic">ISO</emph> magazine.

corpname.value: Tisch School of the Arts. Department of Photography and Imaging
